name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 076
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, You’ll Be Departed Shortly. President Biden’s immigration policies came into the spotlight this week as Texas border patrol was video taped and photographed riding horses and corralling Haitian immigrants, attempting to enter America through the crossing of the Rio Grande, like animals in a pen. Haiti has seen its country deteriorate since the earthquake that devastated them in 2010. Since then, they’ve gone through flash floods, a pandemic, the assassination of their prime minister, international intervention in their politics, and another earthquake, much within the last 2 months. And while President Biden recently remarked on the photos of border patrol as “horrible,” and that “those people (responsible) will pay,” it’s time for him to take action and reform the terrible immigration policies of the previous administration. Because right now a Biden presidency doesn’t look much different than a Trump presidency when it comes to immigration. Colors inspired by the Haitian flag.
